title: IMMORTAL VISIONS
description: Alien. Skunkhead. That’s what they called seventeen-year-old Viata, who was born with silver eyes and a gray streak in her hair.Despite the bullying, Viata’s life was relatively normal until she’s overwhelmed with vivid dreams of Meania, a 500-year-old vampire. These unexplained nightmares turn into visions—intruding into her life to the point that she seeks help for them.When the medication kicks in, and the visions stop, Viata meets Constin, a new boy in school. A few extravagant dates later, she freaks out when he begins to act odd and shows unnatural abilities.After the murders begin, Meania saves her from others like him, and he reveals a deadly secret for her existence. As Viata questions why and how—she learns that she has an impossible decision to make: Accept her destiny or threaten humanity.
author: M.K. Roze
